item.title: Clarke is gone
item.description: This morning I started my day watching the 9th episode of “The Bing Bang Theory”. Just the first minutes, since I had to go to work. It was hilarious, they even made a funny homage to ‘2001 - a space odyssey movie’ (can you believe it?). Feeling comforted by it, I went for my daily dose of slashdot, and then it struck me: Arthur C. Clarke is dead at 90.
